scripts.build:qa: git checkout main && cp .env.development .env.local && next build && next export
scripts.deploy:qa: yarn build:qa && pushd out && aws --region us-east-1 s3 sync --delete . s3://timer-20210220173156-hostingbucket-dev --exclude '*.DS_Store' --cache-control public,max-age=604800 && popd
scripts.build:production: git checkout production && git merge main && git push && cp .env.production .env.local && next build && next export -o prod
scripts.deploy:production: yarn build:production && pushd prod && aws --region us-east-1 s3 sync --delete . s3://timer-20210220173156-hostingbucket-production --exclude '*.DS_Store' --cache-control public,max-age=604800 && popd
scripts.postdeploy:production: git checkout main && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1BZVOCOG1PQ45 --paths "/*"
